title: Rapid drop in South Africa's COVID-19 cases means Omicron may have peaked, experts say
content:
1. Rapid drop in South Africa's COVID-19 cases means Omicron may have peaked, experts say  New York Post
  2. South Africa's omicron coronavirus outbreak subsides as fast as it grew  The Washington Post
  3. (1) Top scientific researcher says South Africa has passed the peak of its Omicron outbreak  CNN
  4. South African study offers Omicron hope  Reuters
  5. South Africa COVID-19 omicron study indicates less likelihood of hospitalization, severe illness  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 南アフリカのCOVID-19感染者の急激な減少は、オミクロンのピークを意味する、と専門家は言う。
专家说，南非COVID-19病例的迅速下降意味着Omicron可能已经达到顶峰
專家說，南非COVID-19病例的迅速下降意味着Omicron可能已經達到頂峯
